author: SissyBoyFloyd
title: Stupid hit on next to last play costs Chargers the Game vs Steelers
text: Posts: 1,612 Stupid hit on next to last play costs Chargers the Game vs Steelers No one has mentioned it, but remember when the Chargers' Jahleel Addae went helmet to helmet on the Steelers' WR on the 1 yard line with 5 seconds left. It was just a lazy stupid hit on a WR being held up by another Charger defender. Addae should have simply finished the play with a proper tackle around the chest or waist. That hit cost the Chargers 1/2 yard penalty from their 1. That extra half yard was the difference in the Steelers RB scoring the winning TD. Just another example of a player not thinking or caring enough which ends up possibly costing his whole team a game.
